name: Froggy Day
description:
Hello,

So it's the first game that I ever created. I hope you will like it (:

If you have any feedback I will really, really appreciate it if you write that down in the comments. It's the perfect game for speedrunning, so you can show your best time in the comments.

Movement:

LeftArrow, Right Arrow / A, D  - Left, Right

R - Reset
